contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 7, 1912 D Crawshawbooth Contest
Crawshawbooth Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
crawshawbooth-contest
None
Bouquet of Ballads
Crawshawbooth, Lancashire Prizes 1st £10, cup and cornet valued £9.9s. 2nd £5, 3rd £3, 4th £2. March contest 1st Burnley Temperance, 2nd Haslingden Temperance. Best euphonium and tromebone - Nelson Old. Best cornet Burnley Temperance. Promoted by Crawshawbooth Agricultural Society.
9 bands competed.
Oct. 27, 2012, 4:13 p.m. Sept. 29, 2018, 6:51 a.m.
1 Nelson Old William Halliwell
2 Haslingden Borough Band William Pollard
3 Burnley Temperance Peter Fairhurst
4 Helmshore Prize Band Richard Aspin
5 Atherton Temperance Charles Anderson
Unknown Result Water Band Rossendale Unknown
